name: Star Trek: Generations Quiz | Star Trek | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the name of the evil scientist?
Captain Harriman told Captain Kirk that the photon torpedoes, tractor beam, and the medical staff would not arrive until when?
questions.explanation:
Tuesday.

	'You left spacedock without a tractor beam?' 'It won't arrive until Tuesday.'

questions.text: What is the name of the substance that the Romulans were searching for?
questions.explanation:
trilithium.

	Funny how we never really saw the Romulans...

questions.text: What did Data say after they blew up the Klingons?
Who did Chekov try to comfort in sickbay?
questions.explanation:
Guinan.

	We found out that it was her later...

questions.text: What was Picard's vision in the Nexxus?
questions.correct: he had lots of kids and a wife
options: he was picking grapes in France
questions.explanation: he had lots of kids and a wife.

questions.correct: he was at his log cabin
questions.explanation: he was at his log cabin.

questions.text: Who was at the helm when the ship crashed?
What were the names of the Klingon sisters?
questions.explanation:
Lursa and B'etor.

	I love Klingon names...*sigh*

questions.text: What race are Guinan and Dr. Soran?
